bug.author: liushanshan07
bug.summary: Tensor not initialized yet when Tensor::type() is called
bug.description: 0828 lastest paddle版本，python load inference model时 recurrent op的commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/pull/17710>#17710</denchmark-link> 导致的Tensor not initialized yet when Tensor::type() is called

comments.comment: 经过一些版本的实验，问题可能出在save/load模型过程，转人跟进
Fixed the problem by offline discussion. I will close this issue.
